page.title: 10Schools In Riddlesden
page.content:
We have 4 schools in our area, they are Grange Middle School, Headmaster Mr.A.Foster, Riddlesden C.E. School, Headmistress Mrs. Dawson, Strong Close Nursery, Headmistress Mrs. Thwaites and a play school which does not have a head teacher.
Grange, because it is a Middle School has a uniform and does exams. The others, having younger children, do not have uniforms or exams.
Grange has 12 classes, 3 in each year and we do French, art, woodwork, home economics, rural studies, world studies, computers as well as English, maths, sports and swimming. We have a goat, ducks, hens, geese, rabbits and two greenhouses.
